data.actual_result: After you scroll down, it seems like you hit the end, and loading animation starts only when you attempt to scroll down more from that end.
data.expected_result: Once you scroll down enough, loading animation should appear automatically and load more logs.
data.short_description: Scrolling down through audit log doesn't give the loading animation before you hit the end.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to audit log, and scroll down until you have to load more. - As soon as it reaches the end, you should see that it just stops without any loading. From there, scroll down for more immediately (need to be fast)
